title: Inc adm int rates could lead to recession

content.prompt: If currently at full employment, which of the following would most likely cause the United States economy to fall into a recession?

choices.label: A decrease in the required reserve ratio
An increase in administered interest rates

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
